Definition: The input is a tweet which can be classified as Hate Speech, Offensive or Normal. Given such a tweet, output the class the tweet belongs to. Hate Speech will contain threatening language towards the community targeted. Offensive language will contain abusive or discriminatory language towards the community targeted.

Positive Examples.input: cowardly actions by the pussy brits men let their women be gangraped by moslim animals should change countrys name to cuckland
Positive Examples.explanation: This tweet targets Muslim community in a violent context. Hence this is Hate Speech.

Positive Examples.input: hoping trumps adviser pushing for a registry for muslims actually happens we need to keep those immigrants in check and terroists out of our country
Positive Examples.explanation: This tweet is offensive since it calls for an entire community to be treated differently

Positive Examples.input: <number> <number> statements issued by va state police in the aftermath of last weekend violence directly contradict inflammatory claims made by gov terry mcauliffe that white supremacist groups stashed weapons around town in advance of the unite the right rally against the removal of confederate statues
Positive Examples.explanation: This tweet is contains no offensive or hateful phrases and merely states a contradiction.

Negative Examples.input: the traffics really bad rn like fuck you too supreme boi i know this so your fault 😔 😔 😔 😔
